metadata.description: Unique DNS Name for the Public IP used to access the Virtual Machine.
Email address used for mongoDB letsencrypt certificates
Amount of VMs to deploy for the mongodb replica set
The username for all mongoDB VMs (also used for connecting oer SSH)
The mongoDB VM public SSH key
The username for connecting to mongoDB
The password for connecting to mongoDB

osProfile.customData:
[base64('#cloud-config

write_files:
 -  encoding: gzip
    content: !!binary |
        
    path: /opt/installmongodb.sh
    permissions: "0744"
 -  encoding: gzip
    content: !!binary |
        
    path: /opt/renew_mongo_cert.sh
    permissions: "0744"

')]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat(' VM_INDEX=', copyIndex(), ' CLUSTER_SIZE=', parameters('clusterSize'), ' CERT_EMAIL=', parameters('certificateEmail'),' MONGODB_USERNAME=', parameters('mongoDBUsername'),' MONGODB_PASSWORD=', parameters('mongoDBPassword'),' APP_DNS_NAME=', reference(resourceId('Microsoft.Network/publicIPAddresses',concat(variables('publicIPAddressName'),copyIndex())),'2017-10-01').dnsSettings.fqdn, ' /bin/bash /opt/installmongodb.sh')]
